admin Package¶

adminController Module¶

main fla.gr index

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

class controllers.admin.adminController.adminIndex(env, members, sessionID)¶

Bases: utils.baseHTMLObject.baseHTMLObject

Returns base index page.

GET()¶

Nothing much, just get the cheetah template for index and return it so Seshat can get cheetah to render it and then return it to the browser
